com.philips.platform.appframework.flowmanager.base

Class BaseState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.platform.appframework.flowmanager.base.BaseState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AboutScreenState, DataServicesState, HomeState, IAPRetailerFlowState, ProductRegistrationState, SettingsFragmentState, SplashState, SupportFragmentState, TestState, UserRegistrationOnBoardingState, WelcomeScreenState

    public abstract class BaseState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the base class for all the state objects. Any new state that is created should extend from this class and implement the abstract methods.
    Since:
    1.1.0
